data.title: Farmland sale prices
data.meta_description: What are historical agricultural land values in Minnesota? How have prices changed over time?
data.text:
The amounts listed below are the prices paid per acre for total farmland (not tillable acres) in each listed county in southwest Minnesota only. There is no other data for other parts of the state.

The data is from farm sales recorded from January 1 through June 30 of the respective years. The data includes only bare land sales. No land and building combination sales are included.

The information is from actual armâ€™s length sales reported to county authorities and collected by personnel of the University of Minnesota Extension. Sales data was not weighted for acres, each sale on a per-acre basis was averaged to get the average price paid per acre.

Data updated for 2023 sales in February 2024.
